title: Love and fear the inseparable twins of a blest matrimony : characterized in a sermon occasioned by the late nuptialls between Mr. William Christmas and Mrs. Elizabeth Adams / Preached by Nathanael Hardy.
author: Hardy, Nathaniel, 1618-1670.
publisher: Printed by T.C. for Nathanael Webb and William Grantham,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
